Title: Enacts the single opportunity for legislative equality (SOLE) act
Summary: Entitles each member of the legislature to bring one statewide piece of legislation of the member's choosing to the floor for a vote without a home rule message and committee review during each two-year term.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, in relation to entitling each member of the legislature to bring one statewide piece of legislation of the member's choosing to the floor for a vote without a home rule message and committee review during each two-year term
